Name: Jane Foster
Title: Software Engineer
About: Welcome to my portfolio website! As a passionate software engineer, I showcase my skills, projects, and expertise in web development. Explore my work and get in touch to discuss exciting opportunities!

Projects.Title: E-commerce Platform
Projects.Description: Developed a scalable e-commerce platform using Go and React, enabling seamless online shopping experiences. Implemented features such as product catalog, shopping cart, and secure payment integration.

Projects.Title: Data Analytics Dashboard
Projects.Description: Built a data analytics dashboard using Python and Tableau, enabling real-time insights and visualization of key business metrics. Integrated data from various sources and created interactive visualizations for informed decision-making.

Projects.Title: Smart Home Automation
Projects.Description: Developed a smart home automation system using IoT technologies and a mobile app. The system allows users to remotely control and monitor home appliances, lighting, and security systems.
